name: Tiara Park Atlantic Porto

reviews.title: Good business hotel
reviews.text: I stayed here for two nights and it's a decent hotel for the business traveller.
I'm amazed to read that families and honeymooners have opted to stay here - it's pretty impersonal.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!!!

reviews.text: Positives - lovely large room, crisp bed linen (although the massive pillows were a bit too soft for me), plug-in broadband (time to get wireless guys!) and spotlessly clean bathroom. Great service from reception and concierge. Bar food excellent (service not so great there though).
reviews.title: Great place to stay

reviews.text: Negatives - Quite a list I'm afraid, although nothing major. For the standard of hotel this is, would have appreciated a widescreen TV rather than the bog standard one. No iron in the room which, given the massive amounts of wardrobe space, is a shame. Massive shower head but very little pressure so more of a dribble (at all times of the day) Also no bathrobe. Thought breakfast was a little disappointing, especially the cooked items. Not great quality, not hot enough. The location of the hotel isn't ideal for the tourist as it's quite a way from the centre. The actual area around the hotel is pretty uninspiring unless you want to visit a deserted and decrepit tiny mall or McDonalds.
reviews.title: top class hotel

aka: Tiara Park Atlantic Porto Hotel Porto
description: Situated in the heart of Porto, the principal city of Northern Portugal, the Tiara Park Atlantic Porto is one of the main landmarks of the Avenida da Boavista business district. Located just 15 km from Francisco Sá Carneiro airport, the hotel invites you to discover a new level of luxury, an integral part of the eternal magic of the city, its history and pulsating cultural life.
